conbody.p:
JavaScript Evaluatorscripting objectsscripting objectsJavaScript EvaluatorYou can use the following scripting objects in the JavaScript Evaluator:
records array An array of records to process. The records object should include different elements based on the processing mode that you use:
Record by Record - The records array should include one record element.
Batch by Batch - The records array should include all records in the batch.
record An object that represents a single record. Includes a single value element. The value element contains the data for the record. Map and list record fields are mapped to to JavaScript maps and arrays, respectively.
out An object that writes the record to the output batch. Includes a write(records) element.Is "element" the right word? What should I use?
err An object that passes error records to the processor for error handling. Includes a write(records) element with an error message parameter.
